data.text:
Wow, wow, wow!! This is quite possibly the best hotel we have ever stayed at. 
The location is perfect – just outside Lindos town, so it’s very very peaceful. 
The private beach is just lovely - bottled water provided, comfortable beds and loungers, waiter service, no kids, and crystal clear water!!
Our room was just beautiful, the view was unbelievable. Room was serviced twice a day, clean beach towels every day. 
On arrival there was a surprise cake and champagne in our room as it was our 10th Wedding Anniversary!! 
Despoina (Debbie) on reception was wonderful, and helped us with car hire, taxis, transfers, restaurant recommendations etc. 
Breakfast is on a beautiful terrace overlooking the infinity pool and the sea. The food is so good and the staff so attentive. Special mention to the lovely Rania who made us feel so special, she even taught us some Greek every morning!
We ate in the restaurant twice and it was honestly absolutely fantastic and Manolis looked after us superbly. We can’t wait to go back!!
data.title: The Best Hotel Ever!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear “Stivesfoodfan”,

Thank you for your amazing 5-star review and for your glowing comments you used to describe your holidays at Lindos Blu, Luxury Hotel & Suites!

We are delighted that you enjoyed such a wonderful holiday and highlighting all the factors that made your stay just a little more special is most appreciated. Creating memories is something we greatly anticipate, and we are so happy to know that entrusting us with your 10th year anniversary proved to be an excellent choice for you!

Suggesting us to the TripAdvisor community is much appreciated and we hope to have the chance of welcoming you back any time soon for another five-star holiday experience at “the best hotel you have ever stayed at”!

Kind regards,

Nikos Triantafillakis
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: LindosBlu    LindosMare

data.text: Bit late writing this review, as I totally forgot!  We absolutely loved every second of staying at this beautiful hotel.  The staff are the best we have ever come across, always happy, friendly and helpful and always knew who you were, nothing was too much trouble, which totally made this holiday one of the best we have ever had.  The rooms are lovely, the food was fantastic as were the cocktails, which we had on the lovely balcony at the bar area every night before dinner, whilst watching the sunset.  The two pool areas were lovely and it was the most relaxed holiday we have had.  We are currently looking for this year’s holiday and really wanted to try another Greek Island, but we keep being drawn back to Lindos Blu, so expect to see us again in June!
data.title: Wonderful Holiday

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear "michellerY6129LW",

Thank you for choosing our resort for your summer holidays and your belated review is highly appreciated! Better later than never as we say, your glowing comments put a big smile on our faces knowing that your experience at Lindos Blu had been exceptional!

It is, indeed, a combination of all the aspects that you mentioned that result to the "Lindos Blu Experience"; a relaxing holiday that has our guests departing with the loveliest of memories! Thank you for highlighting the attentiveness of our team, the delicious cocktails and the ideally located rooms that offer breathtaking views of the bay!

We will be, surely, waiting for your return this June and rest assured that we will do our very best in order to prove that this amazing holiday you had with us can get even better!

Best regards,

Nikos Triantafillakis
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: LindosBlu    LindosMare

data.text:
Back for our fifth visit and almost certain to go back in 2024, so you'll realise we like the place.
We judge other hotels by the standards of service, food and cleanliness at Lindos Blu and have yet to find one that meets them, let alone exceeds them. In the six years since our first visit, we've stayed in many, both in Greece and elsewhere.
data.title: Still the best

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear "Will.Power",

Thank you for your perfect score and for such a glowing description of our facilities and services! It is a true honor to be reading these comments, especially from someone that has traveled many times, and not just in Greece,

Your continuous support is a reward to our efforts in delivering the best of everything for our guests and you can be certain that your compliments will be passed on to the team!

We cannot wait for your 6th(!) visit, at Lindos Blu, during the upcoming summer season of 2024 and we will do our very best in order to make it even more memorable!

Best regards,

Nikos Triantafillakis
Resident Manager
owner_response.author: LindosBlu    LindosMare

data.text:
Just looked on their website advertising all this luxury, when we arrived it was for a special birthday Ienquired about suite & was told it didn’t exist, plus because it was end of season the food was really poor, overall the hotel was super clean but lacking any entertainment on last 3 nights there was no atmosphere at all, if we had paid a sensible price I wouldn’t have minded but maybe because it was half term it cost the same as Caribbean holiday, & we were only half board 
The website was not the experience we had
data.title: Overpriced

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear "Kay",

Being very saddened by having one of our guests evaluate us a low score, shocked after reading that our food on offer was "really poor" and with the icing on the cake being that "suites don't exist" I came in contact with you directly on this platform. 

You, very generously, gave me both names of your party and I replied they are both not to be found  not only on the dates you mentioned but during the whole season. Since then I have texted you 3 times to double check if you have mistaken our resort with a different one and I  still have not got a reply by your side.

I can understand that your summer holidays did not meet your expectations, which is very unfortunate, but it is, the least, unfair for us to be low-scored after a successful summer season and after all the excellent work our team did in order to achieve so high results from a guest that did not stay at our premises and did not experience our services.

I would, dearly, appreciate it if you could find some of your valuable time to reply to my direct messages.

Best regards,

Nikos Triantafillakis
Resident Manager
owner_response.author: LindosBlu    LindosMare

data.text: Actually a bit late to write review (2 years). This is a beautifully designed hotel with really pretty rooms. Our room was spacious, had a pool, which was shared with other rooms. View from room was stunning, overlooking sea. Food was exceptional. Beach was beautiful but I did not like that it was actually quite far from room and you had to cross the street to get there. Great service, as it always is the case in Greece. Location is very convenient for Lindos that has some very nice rooftop restaurants
data.title: Hit: A stunning design

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear "Hit or Miss: world traveller",

Thank you for your belated TripAdvisor review and for describing your holiday experience with such lovely comments!

It is clear that your days with us had been exceptional with wonderful views, excellent service and  an, indeed, convenient and relacing location - just 5 minutes from picturesque town of Lindos.

We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back during the upcoming season of 2024 and provide you with another memorable stay at Lindos Blu!

Kind regards,

Nikos Triantafillakis
Resident Manager
owner_response.author: LindosBlu    LindosMare
